### 🗓️ Week 4: Client Listing Page (Static UI)

**Priority:** 📌 Medium

#### ✅ Tasks:
- [ ] Design client listing page layout
- [ ] Use reusable card or table component
- [ ] Add search and filter inputs (no functionality)
- [ ] Ensure mobile responsiveness
